user.title: Configure Hinen Solar
user.description:
Enter your Hinen Developer Platform credentials. You can obtain your Client ID and Client Secret from the Hinen Developer Platform at https://developer.celinksmart.com

The redirect URL will be auto-detected, but you can customize it if needed (e.g., for external access).
